name: places/ChIJg3nFuvpYwokRJSldDThAPY4
formattedAddress: 600 Madison Ave 14th floor, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 600 Madison Ave 14th floor, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: Olshan accused me of being multiple months behind on my rent. I had clear documentation that my account balance was zero and that I had paid on time for my entire lease term. This was clearly an Olshan mistake. However, when I tried to sort out the mistake, no one at Olshan would answer their phones or respond to email. I even tried calling the main number. I should also add that I contacted them about mold in my apartment (with photos) four months ago and have not received a response about remediation. If you decide to lease with Olshan, document everything.

originalText.text:
Stay away from OLSHAN PROPERTIES at all costs!

Olshan Properties is run by greedy slumlords. This "family run company" is a human spectacle of incompetency - spanning all levels of the organization. They only enforce tenant rules when it is convenient for them (aka never) and rarely answer emails/phone calls. Evidently, Olshan Properties also treats residential building staff poorly - and it shows. 52 Clark St. in Brooklyn Heights has fallen into disrepair since most building staff has left. The doormen are, for the most part, useless and seem to change on a weekly basis. Do yourself a favor and do not rent from these idiotic crooks.

originalText.text: Management failed to disclose the existence of lead-based paint in our apartment unit.  Only upon lease renewal (and our own inquiry) did we come to find out that they had had the apartment tested and results in hand when we first moved in.  I would avoid at all costs.  I was pregnant the entire time we lived in the unit and Management had no regard or compassion for the undue stress they put on us needing to move out 2 weeks following the birth of our child.

originalText.text: Horrible company with people intentionally taking advantage of tenants. They held back & took fees out of our security deposit for no reason, just because they could & we were powerless. Completely unprofessional & out there to take advantage of people. We had issues with mice in our apartment 4 times in 1 year, but still never complained. All rent was paid on time and when we left the apartment we had it professionally cleaned & it was inspected by the super. They don't care though and will take money from you regardless.

originalText.text: Mia Haberfeld should lose her job. Her lack of communication is stunning and her disregard for her residents is infuriating. Olshan Properties owes me $ and has not paid. Do not rent from this LL.
